title: FS low grade t206 HOFers (2 Lajoies)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: FS low grade t206 HOFers (2 Lajoies)
posts.post_content:
Hey guys.  Been feeling the itch to buy some t206s again, but don't have much money laying around, so I'm selling a few doubles so I can add to the collection.  All prices include shipping.  I accept paypal.  Let me know if you have any questions.  Thanks for looking.

Willis $29  SOLD
Chance $42  SOLD
Lajoie throwing $67  SOLD
Lajoie portrait $129  SOLD
All sold except the Willis, which is still available.  I'd also consider trade offers for another low grade t206 hofer that I don't have yet.
